trans-unit.source: PUT and DELETE for snippet.watch from snippets Endpoint.
trans-unit.target: PUT 从摘录Endpoint中为 snippet.watch 进行PUT和 DELETE 操作。

trans-unit.source: brew install python This installs the latest version of Python 2.7 with a version of setuptools and pip. Unfortunately, those versions of setuptools and pip seem to be broken.
trans-unit.target: brew install python 这将安装最新版本的Python 2.7，以及版本的setuptools和pip。不幸的是，这些版本的setuptools和pip似乎已损坏。

trans-unit.source: paver test_all Run all the unit tests and analyze the source code.
trans-unit.target: paver test_all 运行所有单元测试并分析源代码。

trans-unit.source: pip install -r requirements-dev.txt Loads required libraries into the virtual environment.
trans-unit.target: pip install -r requirements-dev.txt 将所需的库加载到虚拟环境中。

trans-unit.source: (Optional, but good practice) Create a virtual environment: mkvirtualenv python-bitbucket Once created, use workon python-bitbucket to restore the virtual environment.
trans-unit.target: （可选，但好的做法）创建虚拟环境： mkvirtualenv python-bitbucket 创建后，请使用 workon python-bitbucket 还原虚拟环境。

trans-unit.source: A Python wrapper for the Bitbucket Cloud REST API. This is not known to work with Bitbucket Server, previously known as Stash. To start working with this library, just do: pip install pybitbucket_fork
trans-unit.target: Bitbucket Cloud REST API的Python包装器。与Bitbucket Server（以前称为Stash）一起使用时，这是未知的。要开始使用此库，只需执行以下操作： pip install pybitbucket_fork

trans-unit.target: 小心。同一资源的属性可能会根据你如何获得它而改变。

trans-unit.target: 克隆版本库,并将其设置为当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Fork of a Python wrapper for the Bitbucket API

If you have enabled two-step verification, then you will need to use an app password with the BasicAuthenticator, not your regular user password. The OAuth2Authenticator is intended as an example and superclass. It may work for some command-line clients. Other clients like web applications will need an appropriate implementation of obtain_authorization() and perhaps may need to use a different grant types.
trans-unit.target: 如果您启用了两步验证，则需要在 BasicAuthenticator 中使用应用密码，而不是常规用户密码。所述 OAuth2Authenticator 旨在作为一个例子，超类。它可能适用于某些命令行客户端。其他客户端（如Web应用程序）将需要适当的实现 obtain_authorization() 并且可能需要使用其他授予类型。

trans-unit.source: In general, finding things is done with a static find method on each type of resource. If the resource is plural, like “snippets” above, then the find method is a generator. You can use it with iterators or comprehensions. The resources you can find are:
trans-unit.target: 通常，使用每种资源的静态查找方法来完成查找。如果资源是复数形式，如上面的“片段”，则find方法是生成器。您可以将其与迭代器或综合功能一起使用。您可以找到的资源是：

trans-unit.source: It’s not virtual like a virtual machine. More like a specialized container for a Python version and libraries.
trans-unit.target: 它不像虚拟机那样是虚拟的。更像是用于Python版本和库的专用容器。

trans-unit.source: Just like attributes, the relationships for the same resource may change depending on how you got to it. If you need the canonical resource with all attributes, use the self() relationship:
trans-unit.target: 就像属性一样，同一资源的关系可能会根据获取方式的不同而发生变化。如果您需要具有所有属性的规范资源，请使用 self() 关系：

trans-unit.source: Navigate Relationships
Project Setup
Python Virtual Environment Setup (for OS X)
trans-unit.target: Python 虚拟环境设置 (OS X)

trans-unit.source: TODO

The Authenticator subclasses prepare API requests with credentials. The simplest case is Anonymous which connects with no credentials. Anonymous can be used with an publicly available resources. For private resources, BasicAuthenticator uses email, username, and password as credentials. If your client application has it’s own mechanisms for working with these values, you can subclass the BasicAuthenticator to provide custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该 Authenticator 子类准备用凭据的API请求。最简单的情况是 Anonymous ，它不连接任何凭据。 Anonymous 可以与公共可用资源一起使用。对于私有资源， BasicAuthenticator 使用电子邮件，用户名和密码作为凭据。如果您的客户端应用程序具有使用它们自己的机制来处理这些值，则可以将 BasicAuthenticator 子类化以提供自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: The method says “for role” but, if not provided, it will use the default of owner. Hence, all your snippets.
trans-unit.target: 该方法显示“用于角色”，但如果未提供，它将使用所有者的默认值。因此，所有片段。

trans-unit.source: What attributes are available? You will not find them hardcoded in Python. They are populated dynamically from the JSON response. You can query the list via a convenience method:
trans-unit.target: 有哪些属性可用?在Python中你不会发现它们是硬编码的。它们是由JSON响应动态填充的。你可以通过一个方便的方法来查询列表。

trans-unit.source: What relationships are available? You will not find them hardcoded in Python. They are populated dynamically from the JSON response. You can query the list via a convenience method:
trans-unit.target: 有哪些关系可用?在Python中你不会发现它们是硬编码的。它们是由JSON响应动态填充的。你可以通过一个方便的方法来查询列表。
